Title: Nigeria ready to host 2030 Games,  Tinubu assures Commonwealth delegation
Summary: President Bola Tinubu restated Nigeria’s readiness to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games, assuring the visiting Commonwealth Sport Bid Evaluation Committee that the country is fully committed to delivering the event on African soil for the first time in the Games’ history .

Title: Social club expands scholarships for Delta, Lagos students
Summary: The Aweleka Social Club of Nigeria has expanded its scholarship programme in partnership with Harvest Haven Farms Nigeria Limited . Over 100 students will be awarded full academic scholarships to over 100 primary and secondary school students for the 2025/2026 academic session .

Title: Sokoto suspends six school principals over misconduct
Summary: Sokoto State Ministry of Basic and Secondary Education has suspended six secondary school principals over alleged misconduct . The affected principals serve at Nana Girls Secondary School, Government Government Government . The suspension includes unauthorised collection of fees for Junior Secondary School examination results .

Title: FCT waste contractors give Sept. 25 ultimatum over 9-month unpaid wages
Summary: Contractors responsible for waste management in Abuja have warned that they will suspend services from September 25 if the Federal Capital Territory Administration fails to settle nine months of unpaid wages . The contractors, operating under the Association of FCT Solidarity, have given an ultimatum .

Title: Full List: Anglican Church confirms 15 new bishops after Ekiti synod
Summary: The Church of Nigeria, Anglican Communion, has confirmed the election of 15 bishops to lead one vacant diocese and 14 newly created dioceses across the country . The decision followed the Episcopal Synod of the House of Bishops, which met on Ekiti .

Title: Teacher-Pupil Ratio: Gov. Yusuf employs 4,315 teachers
Summary: Governor Abba Yusuf of Kano State has employed 4,315 teachers under the Better Education Delivery for All (BESDA) programme . Plans underway to recruit an additional 2,616 teachers soon .

Title: Group urges government to Prioritize climate change in budgets
Summary: Group urges government to Prioritize climate change in budgets . South Saharan Social Development Organization (SSDO) calls on federal and state governments to prioritize climate change . SSDO calls for effective mitigation and adaptation measures .

Title: Tinubu’s Reforms: Nigeria won’t get better for everybody at the same time  —  Tope Fasua
Summary: President Bola Tinubu’s reforms are beginning to yield results, says Fasua . Tope Fasua says Nigeria's economic recovery will not benefit everyone simultaneously . Fasua: Nigeria won’t get better for everybody at the same time .

Title: NDLEA mourns death of Cross River commander Ogbonna Maurice
Summary: NDLEA has announced the sudden death of its Cross River State Commander, CN Ogbonna Maurice Uzoma . The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) mourns death of Cross River commander .

Title: Troops intercept large cache of logistics bound for Niger Republic
Summary: Troops of the Joint Task Force (JTF) North East, Operation HADIN KAI, have achieved a major breakthrough in counter-terrorism operations . Troops intercepted a large consignment of logistics supplies concealed in a trailer along the Nguru–Gashua road in Yobe State .
